meanings.sent1: The burlesquer entertained the audience with their lively performance.
meanings.sent2: She decided to become a burlesquer after attending a show with her friends.
meanings.sent3: The burlesquer's funny dance moves had everyone laughing in the theater.
meanings.sent4: The burlesquer's stage presence was like a shining star in the dimly lit room.
meanings.sent5: The burlesquer's costume was so colorful and eye-catching that it stole the show.

meanings.sent1: He loves to burlesquer at local clubs on weekends.
meanings.sent2: She will burlesquer at the upcoming variety show in town.
meanings.sent3: The group decided to burlesquer their favorite song for a fun talent show act.
meanings.sent4: Her movements on stage seemed to burlesquer the essence of joy itself.
meanings.sent5: The way he burlesquers with such confidence is truly inspiring to others.
